item.description:
Dear Salem Meditators: you are invited to view this film followed by discussion.

AWAKEN - THE FILM - Feel the Shift
Saturday, January 29; 2-5:30
Experience an intimate journey of awakening

Within the current global crisis is an opportunity for each of us to individually awaken to the oneness within, to connect to our inner wisdom, and share what lives in our hearts. Join us to view AWAKEN, a groundbreaking & inspirational film which highlights the presence and wisdom of teachers from diverse spiritual backgrounds, followed by a lively discussion and deep meditation. Facilitator: Meghan McChesney Gilroy, who teaches with Rita Rivera Fox, one of the speakers in the movie.
Cost: $15
To RSVP or for more information contact Meghan: 781.254.4172 or meghan@lifemasteryprograms.com or visit www.lifemasteryprograms.com
For a list of all upcoming events go to www.AHigherBalance.com

..

group.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group

item.name: Awaken: The Film - Feel the Shift
